metadata.title: CVE-2024-22097 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A double-free vulnerability exists in the BrainVision Header Parsingfunctionality of The Biosig Project libbiosig Master Branch (ab0ee111) and2.5.0. A specially crafted .vdhr file can lead to arbitrary code execution.An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: biosig package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
